meanings.definition: To reverse or cancel an action.
meanings.sent2: Remember to undos any changes before exiting the program.
meanings.sent3: He tried to undos his jump off the swing, but it was too late.
meanings.sent4: The magician seemed to undos time itself with his incredible trick.
meanings.sent5: Pressing Ctrl+Z on the keyboard is like a magical undos button.

meanings.definition: The act of reversing or canceling an action.
meanings.sent1: The undos of the decision was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: Software often has an undos feature for mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The undos of the play made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her apology was like an undos for the argument they had.
meanings.sent5: The undos button on the remote control saved the day during the live broadcast.
